content: you ll be ready to power-up with this cute crochet mario fire flower or ice flower amigurumi take your pick it s a simple but unique construction that s super fun to make in this easy to follow along and free crochet pattern you can make it by itself or you can make it into a potted plant you can even make it into a cool mario flower headband this is part of the power-up mario amigurumi series which includes previous patterns i ve made such as 1 yet another mario mushroom pattern 1 2 invincible super star 2 **approximate size of mario flower ** with potted base approximately 6in tall 15cm ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your mario flower turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 3 you can also crochet along with the fire flower video tutorial 4 on my you tube channel ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level** easy intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet in the round slip_stitch chain stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/yet-another-mario-mushroom 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/star-amigurumi-3 3 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 4 https //youtu be/trb1d3gna_y
